QuestData.Title: Precious Cargo
QuestData.Description: They said that their "precious cargo", whatever that is, is being held out on the Alliance ship, the Vengeance Wake.$B$BThere's only one thing to do... fly this thing out there and retrieve it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the precious cargo below deck on the Alliance ship, Vengeance Wake, off the shore of the Lost Isles.
QuestData.CompletionText: Perhaps you can help me to get out of this arcane cage?
QuestData.RewardText: If not for you, I would surely be on my way back to Stormwind to be paraded as a trophy and a slave.$B$BThe Alliance dogs found me unconscious on the shore and put me in this magical cage. It was keeping me from connecting with the elements.$B$BNo longer!
